reasoning:

1. Whether to use The Empress now or save it for later
2. Whether my joker order matters

Let me think about The Empress:


The Empress is a permanent enhancement that adds +4 Mult to two cards. I should hold off using it until I can see my actual hand and identify which cards appear most frequently in my flushesâ€”that way I can maximize the multiplier boost. Joker order matters since effects trigger sequentially from left to right, so my Crafty and Droll Jokers will activate first when I hit a flush, followed by the other effects.
